mapper.select: select * from noticeBoard order by bno desc limit #{startNum}, #{postPerPage}
mapper.insert: insert into noticeBoard(memberId, title, content, nickName) values (#{memberId}, #{title}, #{content}, "관리자")
mapper.update: update noticeBoard set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select count(*) as cnt from noticeBoard
mapper.insert: insert into noticeReplyBoard(memberId, content, bno, nickName) values (#{memberId}, #{content}, #{bno}, #{nickName})
mapper.select: select nickName from members where memberId = #{memberId}
mapper.update: update noticeReplyBoard set content = #{content} where rno = #{rno}
update noticeBoard set readCount = readCount + 1 where bno = #{bno}
